scripts.zip: npm run build && rm -f function.zip && zip -r function.zip index.js package.json yarn.lock clients.json
scripts.setup: dotenv -e .env -- bash -c 'yc config set cloud-id $YC_CLOUD_ID && yc config set folder-id $YC_FOLDER_ID'
scripts.deploy: dotenv -e .env -- bash -c 'npm run zip && yc serverless function version create --function-name=$YC_FUNCTION_NAME --runtime=$YC_RUNTIME --entrypoint=$YC_ENTRYPOINT --memory=$YC_MEMORY --execution-timeout=$YC_EXECUTION_TIMEOUT --source-path=function.zip --cloud-id=$YC_CLOUD_ID --folder-id=$YC_FOLDER_ID --environment BOT_TOKEN=$BOT_TOKEN'
